awardEventDetails.title: 2016 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (INSIDE OUT invites audiences on an introspective adventure unlike any other - bringing to life the emotions that make us whole, while sending them on their own sentimental journey of self-discovery. Presenting this existential exploration as an epic candy-colored confection, Pete Docter and Pixar's brain-trust have created an utterly unforgettable experience - taking us inside the mind of a young girl to consider the emotional bond between sadness and joy.)
